thread.title: BRIEF-Centennial Resource Development Announces Pricing Of Secondary Public Offering Of Class A Common Stock

title: BRIEF-Centennial Resource Development Announces Pricing Of Secondary Public Offering Of Class A Common Stock

organizations.name: secondary public offering of class a common stock reuters

text: March 6, 2018 / 12:59 PM / in 16 minutes BRIEF-Centennial Resource Development Announces Pricing Of Secondary Public Offering Of Class A Common Stock Reuters Staff March 6 (Reuters) - Centennial Resource Development Inc : * CENTENNIAL RESOURCE DEVELOPMENT, INC. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF SECONDARY PUBLIC OFFERING OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK * CENTENNIAL RESOURCE DEVELOPMENT - PRICED UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING OF 25 MILLION SHARES OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK BY SELLING STOCKHOLDERSâ€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
